thread.title: Comment on Falcons and Patriots heading to overtime by exinsidetrader
thread.title_full: Comment on Falcons and Patriots heading to overtime by exinsidetrader

author: exinsidetrader
title: Comment on Falcons and Patriots heading to overtime by exinsidetrader
text:
Feb 5, 2017 10:18 PM 
Where are all of the “this game is over” folks from the first half?? 1964bclions says: Feb 5, 2017 10:18 PM 
This is, indeed, As good as it gets… shlort says: Feb 5, 2017 10:18 PM 
Brady is pretty good. Feb 5, 2017 10:19 PM 
Does this feel fake to anyone else? vancouversportsbro says: Feb 5, 2017 10:19 PM 
New England wins this. Hands down. Atlanta had their chance for a ring and choked it away Feb 5, 2017 10:20 PM 
What an awesome Superbowl. Well done NFL. learysdisciples says: Feb 5, 2017 10:21 PM 
The fix is in… Feb 5, 2017 10:21 PM 
Rex Ryan would have won in regulation. elmerbrownelmerbrown says: Feb 5, 2017 10:22 PM 
I love never say a bad word about the Patriots ever again win or lose rootpain says: Feb 5, 2017 10:22 PM 
Doesn’t matter what happens from here. Brady has proven he is the best ever. No team has ever come back from that much of a deficit. I don’t care what any one says, no other quarterback could have done that. He is clearly the best quarterback. EVER. whenwilliteverend says: Feb 5, 2017 10:23 PM 
Shocking. Atlanta was rolling the Patriots and they decided to stop playing and gave the game away. That’s why you never take your foot off the gas. Since they went up 28-3 Matty Ice has been more like Matty Poo. Feb 5, 2017 10:25 PM 
Holy crap! Feb 5, 2017 10:25 PM 
The Patriots should have a banner that says ” automatic first down “ zeojay says: Feb 5, 2017 10:26 PM 
atl biggest choke team ever matt ryan biggest flop ever all thoes weapons and u still choking SouthStander says: Feb 5, 2017 10:26 PM 
And here come the overly obnoxious patriots fans. whenwilliteverend says: Feb 5, 2017 10:27 PM 
Atlanta just had the biggest choke in Super Bowl history. Maybe they should have stopped celebrating so much after getting the big lead and kept playing hard. qoojo says: Feb 5, 2017 10:27 PM 
As a packers fan, I have to ask if Mike McCarthy consulted as a coach in the second half. fatsolio says: Feb 5, 2017 10:27 PM 
Biggest choke job in the history of pro sports. Congrats to the Pats but that was all on the Falcons for blowing that. More specifically, Matt Ryan for his horrid job in the fourth. Feb 5, 2017 10:27 PM 
thats what the falcons get for beating the vikings back in 1998..bwahahahahahaha Feb 5, 2017 10:27 PM 
GOAT Feb 5, 2017 10:27 PM 
Pats fans going to be insufferable for another year. Feb 5, 2017 10:28 PM 
SouthStander says: Feb 5, 2017 10:26 PM And here come the overly obnoxious patriots fans. 
hell of a comeback by aaron rodgers…..oh wait shlort says: Feb 5, 2017 10:28 PM 
The Falcons will be known for that! Feb 5, 2017 10:28 PM 
Worst Super Bowl ever
